title: AI-Generated Deepfakes & 'King Trump' Video
summary: TIME Magazine: Trump is 'the first world leader to fully deploy AI deepfakes as a core communications strategy.' Shared AI video of 'King Trump' wearing crown, piloting fighter jet, dumping excrement on protesters. Also shared deepfakes of Obama arrested, racist images of Hakeem Jeffries.
keyFacts: TIME Magazine: 'the first world leader to fully deploy AI deepfakes as a core communications strategy'
AI video showing Trump wearing crown, piloting fighter jet, dumping excrement on protesters
Deepfake showing Barack Obama being arrested in orange jumpsuit
Racist AI image depicting Hakeem Jeffries in fake mustache and sombrero
AI video with falsified Nancy Pelosi voice
Depicted Adam Schiff and Gavin Newsom in handcuffs being arrested
Fake Fox News clip promoting imaginary 'MedBeds' that cure all diseases
All shared on official Truth Social account
Blurs line between satire and reality
